subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cleveland’s Justin Masterson pitched a four-hit shutout in Game 1, and the Yankees responded with a five-hitter in Game 2, led by the little-known Vidal Nuno.
snippet: Cleveland’s Justin Masterson pitched a four-hit shutout in Game 1, and the Yankees responded with a five-hitter in Game 2, led by the little-known Vidal Nuno.
